LanguageData.AutothrotIDCount: Multiple cores set to {0}; each core must have a unique ID for autothrottle to engage.
LanguageData.AutothrotRange: Grid excess must be within +/- 5000w to engage.
LanguageData.AutothrotTip: Engage Autothrottle\n\nControl flux level to match power net load. The grid excess on the power net that this console is connected to must be within +/- 5000w to engage.
LanguageData.CoreIdMismatch: Reactor and console ID do not match. Each core requires its own console with a unique ID for autothrottle.
LanguageData.MissingPESUpgrades: When the mod Preemtive Strike is running, its sky object detection research projects must be completed before the ATOM can detect incoming drop pods. The scramblers will however still operate normally.
LanguageData.ShortRangeStratLaunchDesc: Launch a strategic missile on this map
LanguageData.LongRangeStratLaunchDesc: Launch the missile at a target on this Rimworld
LanguageData.HighYieldWarheadDesc: Warheads launched from this silo are set to create a massive explosion that will destroy anything on the map that isn't inside a mountain bunker.
LanguageData.LowYieldWarheadDesc: Missiles launched from this silo are set to create a small tactical explosion.
LanguageData.RimatomicsValveLabelDesc: Toggle the valve open or closed
LanguageData.FlareScramDesc: SCRAM the reactor during solar flares
LanguageData.AlertNeedsTurbineDesc: A reactor needs to be connected to a turbine. Failure to do so may result in overheating and meltdown.
LanguageData.AlertNeedsCoolingDesc: A turbine needs to be connected to a cooling system. Failure to do so may result in overheating and meltdown.
LanguageData.AlertCoreMeltDesc: A reactor is suffering a core melt incident. Evacuate immediately!
LanguageData.AlertCoreOverheatDesc: A reactor is being damaged due to overheating.
LanguageData.AlertCrackedDesc: Stress from running the core at high temperatures for a long period of time has caused the core to crack. It will need to be deconstructed and rebuilt or it will continue to emit lethal radiation, produce less power, and damage the fuel rods.
LanguageData.PodsScrambledOK: Enemy drop pods scrambled by TACS
LanguageData.PodsScrambledDesc: The enemy drop pod guidance systems were scrambled by the TACS using a {0}kw pulse.
LanguageData.PodsScrambledFail: Failed to scramble enemy drop pods!
LanguageData.PodsScrambledFailDesc: The {0}kw pulse required to scramble this raid was not available!
LanguageData.ScrambleDropPodsDesc: Prevent raiders landing in the center of the map by using a large pulse of energy from connected PPC's to scramble the guidance systems of incoming drop pods.
LanguageData.TemperatureTip: Temperature\n\nHigh temperature can cause damage to the core, and crack the fuel. If the core's HP reaches 0 while it is at or above its normal operating temperature, it will explode.
LanguageData.FuelTip:
Fuel

The total amount of fuel in the core. Fuel chain reacts with fuel in adjacent slots which produces more power
Fuel will produce less power over time until it is spent
LanguageData.CoolingTip: Cooling\n\nTotal amount of your cooling capacity that is in use. If the gauge turns red, add more cooling or reduce power.
LanguageData.TurbineTip:
Turbine

Total amount of your turbine capacity that is in use. If the gauge turns red, add more turbines or reduce power.

Turbines also require enough transformers to distribute the power to standard power nets.
LanguageData.PowerTip: Power\n\nTotal amount of power being produced by the reactor. Does not count how much is actually being generated by turbines and transformers.
LanguageData.RadiationTip: Radiation\n\nThe core will emit radiation if it becomes damaged. The amount of radiation increases with the amount of damage.
LanguageData.Dragtoincreasefluxlevel: Drag to increase flux level to produce more power
LanguageData.cycleScreensDesc: Monitor all reactors on this network
LanguageData.AutoScramDesc: SCRAM the reactor core when the temperature reaches unsafe levels, or a solar flare is detected.
LanguageData.FlareSCRAMletterText: A solar flare has triggered a reactor SCRAM.
LanguageData.SCRAMletterText: Unsafe core temperature has triggered a reactor SCRAM.
LanguageData.ATOMdetectionDesc: The TACS has detected a possible threat. It is estimated that {0} will attack {1} in approximately {2}.
LanguageData.ICBMNeedConsole: Requires a manned SACS weapon console
LanguageData.ICBMNeedMissile: A missile is required for launch
LanguageData.criticbmAttack: The enemy faction {0} are preparing to launch a missile attack from a nearby base. You have {1} days before launch.
LanguageData.critBombDetFac: The bomb detonated and {0} has been destroyed.
LanguageData.MessageRailgunNeedsMap: Map not generated, send colonists to scout.
LanguageData.TestFireHELSOnOwnShells: Shoot down our own morter shells for data gathering.
LanguageData.critscramDesc: Return temperature and neutron flux to base values, but leave the core on.
LanguageData.critStartupDesc: Starts the core, allowing temperatures and flux levels to rise.
LanguageData.critShutdownDesc: Shuts down the core, leaving it powered but cold, for refueling and repairs.
LanguageData.NoActiveBenchWithProject: No active bench with required project
LanguageData.critPlaceOnCore: Must be placed on a molten core of correct type
LanguageData.NeedsRiver: Needs to be placed next to a river, lake or ocean
LanguageData.critMoreWater: Requires a larger body of water
LanguageData.critSpentOnly: Set for spent fuel only, none available
LanguageData.critCoreIntegrityDesc: The integrity of this core is so low that it may crack.
LanguageData.TradeShipPriceNeed: Need {0} silver to send trade ship
LanguageData.TradeShipReq: A Rimatomics trade ship has been dispached to your planet.\n\nIt will take 2 days to arrive.
LanguageData.PowerLimitDesc: Change the power limit for this transformer. Used for changing power distribution over multiple power nets.\n\nHold Shift for finer control.
LanguageData.BlueprintUpgradeDesc: This is a blueprint upgrade. New constructions will have this upgrade built in as standard; existing buildings will need to be manually upgraded using the crafted module.
LanguageData.ResearchPriceNeed: Requires {0} Silver near a trade beacon
LanguageData.coreUpgradeFail: Can't upgrade while core is active
LanguageData.powerUpgradeFail: Building must be powered down before upgrading
